text: Sudha Murty ( Kulkarni; born 19 August 1950) is an Indian educator, writer and philanthropist. She is the chairperson of the Infosys Foundation. She is married to the co-founder of Infosys, N. R. Narayana Murthy. Murty was awarded the Padma Shri, the fourth highest civilian award in India, for social work by the Government of India in 2006. She is the mother of Akshata Murty, the wife of Prime Minister of the United Kingdom Rishi Sunak. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Indian philanthropists Category:Writers from Karnataka
title: Sudha Murty
